thread.title: Facebook stock hits all-time high amid tech euphoria
thread.title_full: Facebook stock hits all-time high amid tech euphoria

title: Facebook stock hits all-time high amid tech euphoria
text:
Facebook stock hits all-time high amid tech euphoria 
Times Of India Saturday 24th October, 2015 
SAN FRANCISCO: Facebook shares lifted on Friday to an all-time high, crossing $100 for the first time, during a rally in the technology sector on Wall Street. Shares in Facebook rallied 2.5% to close at a record $102.19, to give the world's biggest social network a market value of $288 billion....
